{{Lang|'''Kaedehara Hisamichi'''|ja=楓原久通|ja_rm=Kaedehara Hisamichi}} was [[Kaedehara Kazuha]]'s grandfather who died before the start of the game. Kazuha's memories with him appear during the {{Quest|As the Courtyard in Spring Once Appeared (Part 1)}}.
